58 class QtDcmFindDicomdirPrivate
59 {
60 
61 public:
62  DcmItem * dcmObject;
63  DcmStack dicomdirItems;
64 };
65 
66 QtDcmFindDicomdir::QtDcmFindDicomdir ( QObject * parent ) : d ( new QtDcmFindDicomdirPrivate )
67 {
68  d->dcmObject = NULL;
69 }
70 
71 QtDcmFindDicomdir::~QtDcmFindDicomdir()
72 {
73  delete d;
74  d = NULL;
75 }
76 
77 void QtDcmFindDicomdir::setDcmItem ( DcmItem * item )
78 {
79  d->dcmObject = item;
80 }
81 
82 void QtDcmFindDicomdir::findPatients()
83 {
84  static const OFString Patient ( "PATIENT" );
85 
86  // Loading all the dicomdir items in a stack
87  DcmStack itemsTmp;
88 
89  if ( !d->dcmObject->findAndGetElements ( DCM_Item, itemsTmp ).good() )
90  {
91  return;
92  }
93 
94  while ( itemsTmp.card() > 0 )
95  {
96  d->dicomdirItems.push ( itemsTmp.top() );
97  itemsTmp.pop();
98  }
99 
100  //Unstacking and loading the different lists
101  while ( d->dicomdirItems.card() > 0 )
102  {
103  DcmItem* lobj = ( DcmItem* ) d->dicomdirItems.top();
104  DcmStack dirent;
105 
106  OFCondition condition = lobj->findAndGetElements ( DCM_DirectoryRecordType, dirent );
107 
108  if ( !condition.good() )
109  {
110  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
111  continue;
112  }
113 
114  while ( dirent.card() )
115  {
116  DcmElement* elt = ( DcmElement* ) dirent.top();
117  OFString cur;
118  elt->getOFStringArray ( cur );
119 
120  if ( cur == Patient )
121  {
122  DcmElement* lelt;
123  QMap<QString, QString> infosMap;
124 
125  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_PatientName, lelt ).good() )
126  {
127  OFString strName;
128  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strName );
129  infosMap.insert ( "Name", QString ( strName.c_str() ) );
130  }
131 
132  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_PatientID, lelt ).good() )
133  {
134  OFString strID;
135  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strID );
136  infosMap.insert ( "ID", QString ( strID.c_str() ) );
137  }
138 
139  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_PatientBirthDate, lelt ).good() )
140  {
141  OFString strBirth;
142  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strBirth );
143  infosMap.insert ( "Birthdate", QString ( strBirth.c_str() ) );
144  }
145 
146  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_PatientSex, lelt ).good() )
147  {
148  OFString strSex;
149  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strSex );
150  infosMap.insert ( "Sex", QString ( strSex.c_str() ) );
151  }
152 
153  QtDcmManager::instance()->foundPatient ( infosMap );
154  }
155 
156  dirent.pop();
157  }
158 
159  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
160  }
161 
162  d->dicomdirItems.clear();
163 }
164 
165 void QtDcmFindDicomdir::findStudies ( QString patientName )
166 {
167  bool proceed = false;
168  static const OFString Patient ( "PATIENT" );
169  static const OFString Study ( "STUDY" );
170 
171  // Loading all the dicomdir items in a stack
172  DcmStack itemsTmp;
173 
174  if ( !d->dcmObject->findAndGetElements ( DCM_Item, itemsTmp ).good() )
175  return;
176 
177  while ( itemsTmp.card() > 0 )
178  {
179  d->dicomdirItems.push ( itemsTmp.top() );
180  itemsTmp.pop();
181  }
182 
183  //Unstacking and loading the different lists
184  while ( d->dicomdirItems.card() > 0 )
185  {
186  DcmItem* lobj = ( DcmItem* ) d->dicomdirItems.top();
187  DcmStack dirent;
188 
189  OFCondition condition = lobj->findAndGetElements ( DCM_DirectoryRecordType, dirent );
190 
191  if ( !condition.good() )
192  {
193  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
194  continue;
195  }
196 
197  while ( dirent.card() )
198  {
199  DcmElement* elt = ( DcmElement* ) dirent.top();
200  OFString cur;
201  elt->getOFStringArray ( cur );
202 
203  if ( cur == Patient )
204  {
205  DcmElement* lelt;
206 
207  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_PatientName, lelt ).good() )
208  {
209  OFString strName;
210  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strName );
211  proceed = ( QString ( strName.c_str() ) == patientName );
212  }
213  }
214 
215  if ( ( cur == Study ) && proceed )
216  {
217  DcmElement* lelt;
218  QMap<QString, QString> infosMap;
219 
220  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_StudyInstanceUID, lelt ).good() )
221  {
222  OFString strUID;
223  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strUID );
224  infosMap.insert ( "UID", QString ( strUID.c_str() ) );
225  }
226 
227  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_StudyID, lelt ).good() )
228  {
229  OFString strID;
230  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strID );
231  infosMap.insert ( "ID", QString ( strID.c_str() ) );
232  }
233 
234  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_StudyDescription, lelt ).good() )
235  {
236  OFString strDescription;
237  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strDescription );
238  infosMap.insert ( "Description", QString ( strDescription.c_str() ) );
239  }
240 
241  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_StudyDate, lelt ).good() )
242  {
243  OFString strDate;
244  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strDate );
245  infosMap.insert ( "Date", QString ( strDate.c_str() ) );
246  }
247  QtDcmManager::instance()->foundStudy ( infosMap );
248  }
249 
250  dirent.pop();
251  }
252 
253  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
254  }
255 
256  d->dicomdirItems.clear();
257 }
258 
259 void QtDcmFindDicomdir::findSeries ( QString patientName, QString studyUID )
260 {
261  bool proceed = false;
262  static const OFString Patient ( "PATIENT" );
263  static const OFString Study ( "STUDY" );
264  static const OFString Series ( "SERIES" );
265 
266  // Loading all the dicomdir items in a stack
267  DcmStack itemsTmp;
268 
269  if ( !d->dcmObject->findAndGetElements ( DCM_Item, itemsTmp ).good() )
270  return;
271 
272  while ( itemsTmp.card() > 0 )
273  {
274  d->dicomdirItems.push ( itemsTmp.top() );
275  itemsTmp.pop();
276  }
277 
278  OFString strName;
279 
280  OFString strDate;
281  //Unstacking and loading the different lists
282 
283  while ( d->dicomdirItems.card() > 0 )
284  {
285  DcmItem* lobj = ( DcmItem* ) d->dicomdirItems.top();
286  DcmStack dirent;
287 
288  OFCondition condition = lobj->findAndGetElements ( DCM_DirectoryRecordType, dirent );
289 
290  if ( !condition.good() )
291  {
292  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
293  continue;
294  }
295 
296  while ( dirent.card() )
297  {
298  DcmElement* elt = ( DcmElement* ) dirent.top();
299  OFString cur;
300  elt->getOFStringArray ( cur );
301 
302  if ( cur == Patient )
303  {
304  DcmElement* lelt;
305 
306  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_PatientName, lelt ).good() )
307  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strName );
308  }
309 
310  if ( cur == Study )
311  {
312  DcmElement* lelt;
313 
314  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_StudyInstanceUID, lelt ).good() )
315  {
316  OFString strUid;
317  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strUid );
318  proceed = ( ( QString ( strName.c_str() ) == patientName ) && ( QString ( strUid.c_str() ) == studyUID ) );
319  }
320 
321  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_StudyDate, lelt ).good() )
322  {
323  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strDate );
324  }
325  }
326 
327  if ( ( cur == Series ) && proceed )
328  {
329  DcmElement* lelt;
330  QMap<QString, QString> infosMap;
331 
332  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_SeriesInstanceUID, lelt ).good() )
333  {
334  OFString strID;
335  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strID );
336  infosMap.insert ( "ID", QString ( strID.c_str() ) );
337  }
338 
339  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_SeriesDescription, lelt ).good() )
340  {
341  OFString strDescription;
342  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strDescription );
343  infosMap.insert ( "Description", QString ( strDescription.c_str() ) );
344  }
345 
346  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_Modality, lelt ).good() )
347  {
348  OFString strModality;
349  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strModality );
350  infosMap.insert ( "Modality", QString ( strModality.c_str() ) );
351  }
352 
353  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_InstitutionName, lelt ).good() )
354  {
355  OFString strInstitution;
356  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strInstitution );
357  infosMap.insert ( "Institution", QString ( strInstitution.c_str() ) );
358  }
359 
360  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_AcquisitionNumber, lelt ).good() )
361  {
362  OFString strCount;
363  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strCount );
364  infosMap.insert ( "InstanceCount", QString ( strCount.c_str() ) );
365  }
366 
367  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_PerformingPhysicianName, lelt ).good() )
368  {
369  OFString strOperator;
370  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strOperator );
371  infosMap.insert ( "Operator", QString ( strOperator.c_str() ) );
372  }
373 
374  infosMap.insert ( "Date", QString ( strDate.c_str() ) );
375 
376  QtDcmManager::instance()->foundSerie ( infosMap );
377  }
378 
379  dirent.pop();
380  }
381 
382  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
383  }
384 
385  d->dicomdirItems.clear();
386 }
387 
388 void QtDcmFindDicomdir::findImages ( QString seriesUID )
389 {
390  bool proceed = false;
391  static const OFString Patient ( "PATIENT" );
392  static const OFString Study ( "STUDY" );
393  static const OFString Series ( "SERIES" );
394  static const OFString Image ( "IMAGE" );
395 
396  // Loading all the dicomdir items in a stack
397  DcmStack itemsTmp;
398 
399  if ( !d->dcmObject->findAndGetElements ( DCM_Item, itemsTmp ).good() )
400  return;
401 
402  while ( itemsTmp.card() > 0 )
403  {
404  d->dicomdirItems.push ( itemsTmp.top() );
405  itemsTmp.pop();
406  }
407 
408  OFString strName;
409 
410  OFString strDate;
411  //Unstacking and loading the different lists
412 
413  while ( d->dicomdirItems.card() > 0 )
414  {
415  DcmItem* lobj = ( DcmItem* ) d->dicomdirItems.top();
416  DcmStack dirent;
417 
418  OFCondition condition = lobj->findAndGetElements ( DCM_DirectoryRecordType, dirent );
419 
420  if ( !condition.good() )
421  {
422  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
423  continue;
424  }
425 
426  while ( dirent.card() )
427  {
428  DcmElement* elt = ( DcmElement* ) dirent.top();
429  OFString cur;
430  elt->getOFStringArray ( cur );
431 
432  if ( cur == Series )
433  {
434  DcmElement* lelt;
435  QMap<QString, QString> infosMap;
436 
437  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_SeriesInstanceUID, lelt ).good() )
438  {
439  OFString strID;
440  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strID );
441  proceed = ( QString ( strID.c_str() ) == seriesUID );
442  }
443  }
444 
445  if ( ( cur == Image ) && proceed )
446  {
447  DcmElement* lelt;
448 
449  OFString strUID;
450  OFString strNumber ( "0" );
451  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_InstanceNumber, lelt ).good() )
452  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strNumber );
453 
454  if ( lobj->findAndGetElement ( DCM_ReferencedSOPInstanceUIDInFile, lelt ).good() )
455  {
456  lelt->getOFStringArray ( strUID );
457  }
458  QtDcmManager::instance()->foundImage ( QString ( strUID.c_str() ), QString ( strNumber.c_str() ).toInt() );
459  }
460 
461  dirent.pop();
462  }
463 
464  d->dicomdirItems.pop();
465  }
466 
467  d->dicomdirItems.clear();
468 }
